sentences.sContent: He quoted a short passage from the Bible.
sentences.sCn: 他引用了《圣经》里的一小段。

sentences.sContent: A military spokesman was quoted as saying that the border area is now safe.
sentences.sCn: 报道引述军方一位发言人的话，说边境地区现在很安全。

remMethod.val: quot(引用) + e → 引用， 引述

words.tran: 可引用的；适于引用的；有引用价值的
[贸易] 报价单；引用语；引证

trans.tranCn: 引用， 引述 from another usually with credit acknowledgment)
trans.tranOther: to repeat exactly what someone else has said or written
